r.d: This class is based on the provided connection samples from Apple. This is a pear installable version of Aaron Axelsen's authentication class from http://omega1.uww.edu/itunesu/ Written by Aaron Axelsen <axelsena at uww dot edu> University of Wisconsin - Whitewater Modified by Brett Bieber <brett.bieber@gmail.com> - University of Nebraska-Lincoln
r.n: This is a pear installable version of Aaron Axelsen's authentication class from http://omega1.uww.edu/itunesu/ * Rename class to UNL_iTunesU to follow PEAR channel & package naming conventions * Add back in support for PEAR_Request if curl is not enabled * Add back in support for PEAR_Message if hash_hmac is not enabled * Remove defaults populated in class * Add method to constructor for setting values, pass an associative array of values to the contructor such as $options = array("administratorCredential"=>"Administrator@urn:mace:itunesu.com:sites:example.edu"); * Add method addAnonymousCredential()
